definition: level with one's knees/knee-length (skirt etc)/knee-deep (mud etc)
(name of states and dynasties at several different periods)/surname Qi
neat/even/level with/identical/simultaneous/all together/to even sth out

sentences.english: They had to wade knee-deep through mud and debris to reach the victims.
sentences.chinese: 他們須通過齊膝的爛泥和堆積物。
他陷進齊膝深的爛泥裏。

sentences.english: Into a field of Daisies… knee high.
Water churned into streets nearby, in some places approaching knee-level.
sentences.chinese: 洪水湧入鄰近的街道，有些地方的水接近齊膝深。
